description: This site contains information about the prehistoric archaeology of the Aegean. Through a series of lessons and illustrations, it traces the cultural evolution of humanity in the Aegean basin from the era of hunting and gathering (Palaeolithic-Mesolithic) through the early village farming stage (Neolithic) and the formative period of Aegean civilization into the age of the great palatial cultures of Minoan Crete and Mycenaean Greece.
history: 2015-06-03T04:59:45.485721: Data automatically parsed from content of http://ancientworldonline.blogspot.com/2013/11/aegean-prehistoric-archaeology-textbook.html. (walk_to_json.py)
title: Aegean Prehistoric Archaeology Textbook Online
